webscript.description: Starts a WWARN workflow with the passed in name and parameters. To test: curl -v -u admin:admin -d @startworkflow.json -H "Content-Type:application/json" http://localhost:8080/alfresco/service/wwarn/startworkflow startworkflow.json file content: { workflowName: "ww:clinicalStudyProcess", study: { id: "ABCDE", folderPath: "/WWARN/Studies/ABCDE", modules: "Clinical", region: "Africa", countries: "ANGOLA,BOTSWANA", contributorEmail: "contributor@wwarn.org" } }
